code:
export const BASE_URL='https://register.nomoreparties.co';let isLoggedIn=false;export const getIsLoggedIn=()=>isLoggedIn;export const setIsLoggedIn=value=>{return isLoggedIn=value;};// Registrar un nuevo usuario
export const register=(password,email)=>{return fetch("".concat(BASE_URL,"/signup"),{method:'POST',headers:{Accept:'application/json','Content-Type':'application/json'},body:JSON.stringify({password,email})}).then(response=>{return response.json();});};//login and get token
export const authorize=(password,email)=>{return fetch("".concat(BASE_URL,"/signin"),{method:'POST',headers:{Accept:'application/json','Content-Type':'application/json'},body:JSON.stringify({password,email})}).then(response=>response.json());};// comprueba el token la validez del token
export const checkToken=token=>{return fetch("".concat(BASE_URL,"/users/me"),{method:'GET',headers:{Accept:'application/json','Content-Type':'application/json',Authorization:"Bearer ".concat(token)}}).then(res=>res.json());};
